text: "Forever" is a song performed by Ukrainian singer Alekseev. It represented Belarus in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018. The song was released as a digital download on 10 January 2018 through Zion Music. ==Eurovision Song Contest== The song competed in the first semi-final, held on 8 May 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal. It did not qualify for the grand final. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"|Russia (Tophit) Russian version: "Navsegda" | 22 |} ==Release history== {|class=wikitable ! title: Forever (Alekseev song)
